cs.IT, cs.CC, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses a coding technique called polar coding, which is used for error correction in communication channels. This falls under the category of information theory (cs.IT). The paper also discusses the robustness of the theory over communication models, which could fall under the categories of computational complexity (cs.CC), signal processing (cs.SI), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), and machine learning (cs.LG).
